title: PhD Scholarships in the School of Computer Science
major: Applied and Pure Sciences, Computer Science, Engineering
personal_criteria: Open to all genders, Underrepresented groups encouraged
experience_criteria: Strong academic background in Computer Science or related fields
research_criteria: Submit a research proposal aligned with department goals
certification_criteria: GRE scores may be required for some applicants
achievement_criteria: First-class or upper second-class honours degree
description: These scholarships offer a unique opportunity to pursue PhD studies in cutting-edge areas of Computer Science. They provide financial support including tuition coverage and a living stipend.
